alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:49AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Phelps, Gosper and Dawson Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 448 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Willow Island to Stockville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cozad around 455 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lexington and Overton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 249. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
